select distinct(cinemaCity) from cinema where cinemaIdx not in(0)
select distinct(to_char(a.scheduleDate,'YYYY-MM'))as scheduleMonth from(select * from schedule where scheduleDate >= #{scheduleDate})a order by scheduleMonth asc

select a.* from(select distinct(scheduleDate),to_char(scheduleDate,'YYYY-MM')as scheduleMonth from schedule where scheduleDate >= #{scheduleDate})a where scheduleMonth = #{reservationMonth} order by scheduleDate asc
select a.* from(select distinct(scheduleDate),to_char(scheduleDate,'YYYY-MM')as scheduleMonth from schedule)a where a.scheduleMonth = #{month} order by scheduleDate asc
